title: Saint Damien de Veuster Day
context: ยง8-8 Saint Damien de Veuster Day. May 10 of each year shall be known and designated as &ldquo;Saint Damien de Veuster Day&rdquo;, provided that this day is not and shall not be construed to be a state holiday.
